sentences.english: Thirteen is much different from thirty.
sentences.chinese: 十叄和叄十是很不相同的。

sentences.english: Thirteen is much different from thirty.
sentences.chinese: 十叄和叄十是很不相同的。

sentences.english: The woman is thirty years old, this is the most attractive rose, the age of maturity and charming.
sentences.chinese: 女忍叄拾歲湜玫瑰，哲湜最猶魅力得年齡，成熟迷忍。

sentences.english: Three episodes have been telescoped into a single programme.
sentences.chinese: 把叄集的內容壓縮成了一個節目。
八百伍拾叄元人民幣，先生。

sentences.english: He already has three grandchildren around him everyday.
sentences.chinese: 現在已經有叄個孫子每天圍繞在他身邊。

sentences.english: Lastly add in assam juice and bring to boil.
sentences.chinese: 最後加入阿叄水煮滾即可。

sentences.english: She's had three husbands and I'll be an old maid.
sentences.chinese: 她有過叄個丈夫，而我要變成一個老處女了。

sentences.english: These plans were well rehearsed, involving banks and other financial infrastructure providers.
sentences.chinese: 各銀行及金融基礎設施供應商均積極叄與計劃的演習。

sentences.english: The school is now organizing a freshman basketball team and I plan to join.
sentences.chinese: 學校正在組織新鮮人籃球隊，我打算報名叄加。

sentences.english: This year sees the tercentenary of Handel's birth.
sentences.chinese: 今年是韓德爾誕辰叄百週年。

sentences.english: The United States was a nonparticipating country in the League of Nations.
sentences.chinese: 美國是一個不叄加國際聯盟的國家。

sentences.english: Which maketh Arcturus, Orion, and Pleiades, and the chambers of the south.
sentences.chinese: 他造北斗，叄星，昴星，並南方的密宮。

sentences.english: Time was you could get a good three-course meal for less than a pound.
sentences.chinese: 那年頭喫一頓叄道菜的好飯還花不了一英鎊。

sentences.english: The Peacock Flying Southeast, Shisanyao Hu Bei.
sentences.chinese: 孔雀東南飛，十叄幺胡北。

definition: archaic variant of 參|叁, banker's anti-fraud numeral three
archaic variant of 貳|贰, banker's anti-fraud numeral two
"long stride" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 54), occurring in 建, 延, 廷 etc
archaic variant of 壹 banker's anti-fraud numeral one
"eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system
